name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 3 - The Sorceress of Smailholm
name_original: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 3 - The Sorceress of Smailholm
description: A tiny village in Scotland has seen better days. Recently, two little girls have been murdered and the locals suspect the work of witches. In what may be his toughest case yet, Ben must figure out what happened to the children and discover if the witch rumors are true. However, this time he may end up in over his head...
